review:
Dr.Akshay is a very humble and patient caring doctor.  I visited yesterday for my knee joint pain and lower back pain.  On taking X ray he treated me very well. I got immediate relief of pain. Before visiting him I struggled to get inside the hospital but while coming out from hospital on treatment, happily put my steps without much stress. He has prescribed afew tablets and advised for simple exercises. I strongly recommend persons with orthopaedic problems to visit this doctor.. 
God Bless You Akshay. You‚Äôre doing good contribution to the society.  With regards, Manjunath Jois.

Consulted for my father. Excellent experience with the consultation. His knowledge on the subject and medical advice has been very useful.  He explained the diagnosis and treatment really well. Thank you!
Dr. Akshay is very patient, understanding and helpful. I am satisfied with my treatment of ITB syndrome.
